document_title: Bronchiectasis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Bronchiectasis (Bronchiectasis in English) is a condition of irreversible dilation of part of the bronchial tree, which can be dilatation in large bronchi while small bronchi remain normal, or dilatation in small bronchi while large bronchi remain normal. Normal. (first)
The disease is an irreversible condition of one or more bronchi
Bronchiectasis is divided into saccular bronchiectasis, cylindrical bronchiectasis and rosary bronchiectasis based on pathology.
subsection_title: gian phe quan.json. What is bronchiectasis?
